machine_start_gcode.default_value:
G21 ;metric values
G90 ;absolute positioning
M82 ;set extruder to absolute mode
M107 ;start with the fan off
G28 X0 Y0 ;move X/Y to min endstops
G28 Z0 ;move Z to min endstops
G1 Z15.0 F{speed_travel} ;move the platform down 15mm
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length
G1 F200 E3 ;extrude 3mm of feed stock
G92 E0 ;zero the extruded length again
G1 F{speed_travel}
M117 Printing...
G5

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
G91 ;relative positioning
G1 F1000 ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle
G1 F2000 Z10 ;lift nozzle 10mm and retract more filament
G90 ;change to absolute
G1 X0 Y400 ;prepare for part rermovel
M104 S0 ; turn off hotend (0Â°C)
M106 S0 ; turn off cooling fan
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
M84 ; disable motors
